meanings.sent1: I am disassembling the toy car to see how it works.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is disassembling the engine to fix the problem.
meanings.sent3: He thought disassembling the clock would make time stop.
meanings.sent4: Disassembling the puzzle revealed its intricate design.
meanings.sent5: She carefully started disassembling the old computer, piece by piece.

meanings.definition: To break down into its component parts
To disassemble a machine or device
